sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnnewsinfo ( NEWS_ID /* */ , NEWS_SJ /* */ , NEWS_CN /* */ , NEWS_ORIGIN /* */ , NTCE_AT /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , NTCE_DE /* */ , ATCH_FILE_ID /* */ ) VALUES ( #newsId# /* */ , #newsSj# /* */ , #newsCn# /* */ , #newsOrigin# /* */ , #ntceAt# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , #ntceDe# /* */ , #atchFileId# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnnewsinfo SET NEWS_ID=#newsId# /* */ , NEWS_SJ=#newsSj# /* */ , NEWS_CN=#newsCn# /* */ , NEWS_ORIGIN=#newsOrigin# /* */ , NTCE_AT=#ntceAt# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , NTCE_DE=#ntceDe# /* */ , ATCH_FILE_ID=#atchFileId# /* */ WHERE NEWS_ID=#newsId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT NEWS_ID /* */ , NEWS_SJ /* */ , NEWS_CN /* */ , NEWS_ORIGIN /* */ , NTCE_AT /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , NTCE_DE /* */ , ATCH_FILE_ID /* */ FROM comtnnewsinfo WHERE NEWS_ID=#newsId# /* */

SELECT NEWS_ID /* */ , NEWS_SJ /* */ , NEWS_CN /* */ , NEWS_ORIGIN /* */ , NTCE_AT /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , NTCE_DE /* */ , ATCH_FILE_ID /* */ FROM comtnnewsinfo WHERE 1=1
NEWS_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
NEWS_SJ LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY NEWS_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnnewsinfo WHERE 1=1
NEWS_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
NEWS_SJ LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
